column2:
'Machine Learning provides the following MLOps capailities:'
'\xc2\x7 Create reproducile machine learning pipelines. Use machine learning pipelines'
'to define repeatale and reusale steps for your data preparation, training, and'
'scoring processes.'
'.'
'Create reusale software environments. Use these environments for training and'
'deploying models.'
'.'
'Register, package, and deploy models from anywhere. You can also track'
'associated metadata required to use the model.'
'Capture the governance data for the end-to-end machine learning lifecycle. The'
'logged lineage information can include who is pulishing models and why'
'changes were made. It can also include when models were deployed or used in'
'production.'
